string.value: Tangyoon says he's found a new ingredient to work with. I wonder what Tangyoon has in mind now?

Tangyoon has been experimenting with a new dish as of late, using an ingredient that no one has ever used before. This time, he says he's been working with Cold Eye Tails! He says that he could make something new and fresh if only I would bring him #b50 Cold Eye Tails#k... Hope it comes out tasty! \n\n#i 4000023##t 4000023# #b#c 4000023#/50#k
Just as I'd thought... Cold Eye Tails aren't meant to be eaten.
Hey you're here once again! This time, I'm going to succeed in this, so you'll finally get to truly enjoy my cooking.
This time I am going to use Cold Eye Tails. Evil Eye and Curse Eye weren't all that... but I have a feeling this time, it's going to work really well! Now, please go get me #b50 Cold Eye Tails#k.
Do you not trust my cooking skills? That's disappointing.
Okay! Shall we cook now?\n(Stir... heat... toss... toss... thwap!)
Oh wow... these tails are cold just like the name suggests. I'm going to mix it with milk and freeze them for a nice Ice Cream Pop. Hmmm... this is not bad, but I don't want to make it again.
Alright, here's one for you. What do you think? Who would have thought a Cold Eye Tail could turn into something like this?
(Mmmm... wait, this is just a strawberry-flavored ice cream pop. Is this really made out of Cold Eye Tails?)
Please get me 50 Cold Eye Tails
